org.openstack4j.api.networking

Interface SecurityGroupService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RestService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityGroupServiceImpl

    public interface SecurityGroupService
extends RestService
    Provides Neutron-based Security Group services.
    Author:
    Nathan Anderson
